data.description:
Play the Drums Like a Rock Hero and Conquer Hell!

Drums Rock is your ultimate VR drumming experience. Battle demons and their bosses in a rock-fueled adventure!

Characteristics:
- Real Rock! Enjoy hard rock, heavy metal, Nu metal, and more. Experience a wide variety of rock genres, featuring original music and licensed songs from hit groups like Green Day, The Offspring, and Simple Plan!
- Stylish and Crazy Graphics with a brutal finishing level. Immerse yourself in visually stunning environments.
- TRUE Drums Set! Play on a customizable drum set that feels authentic and responsive.
- Create Custom Songs! Unleash your creativity by making your own tracks to play.
- Extensive Campaign: Over 4 hours of campaign gameplay plus all the exciting extras!
- Dozens of Unlockables! Unlock new drumsticks, drums, songs, and more as you progress.
- Intuitive Gameplay for Everyone: Enjoy easy-to-learn controls with no dizziness. You can even play while seated.
- Feel the Rock 'n Roll: Master advanced levels, perform flourishes with your sticks, and dominate the drums.
- Diverse Enemies and Bosses: Face unique foes in special levels and discover different worlds.
- Online Ranking: Compete against your friends and climb the leaderboards.
- Musical Versions of Other Videogames: Discover exciting musical twists on your favorite games!
- 4 Difficulty Levels: Suitable for all skill levels, with a fair progression system.
- Customize Your Drum Set: Configure your drum set any way you like and experience unparalleled control and personalization.
- Live Mixed Reality: Immerse yourself in a mixed reality experience like never before.

· New languages added (Korean, Japansese, Italian, German).
· New grab mode added to the game (sticky mode).
· New alternative system for summoning drumsticks (Drumstick Summoning Aid).
· Settings menu has been rearranged.
· New Song: Black Betty.
· New Song: Pleiades, Professor Plumb.
· Minor bug fixing.

· New Boss (Unarmed Guitarist) on Rule The Night song! You can confront this boss in Campaign Mode at the final Chapter of Act 2

· New Song: Red Devil, John Verity
· New Song: Ode to Joy, Arranged by Garage51
· 90 FPS Mode has been added on general settings
· More songs are unlocked by default
· Latency Adjustment has been added at general settings
· Added the option to choose between the two different modes to display double notes
· Added the option to adjust volume for the music drums and the drums fx
· Added a UI element on the scene showing the perfect spot to hit a note
· Bug fixing

The first update of Drums ROCK is now available.

The Rock of Ages update is headlined by the addition of I love rock'n roll and the Ruski Bruski song.

New songs:
- I love rock'n roll - Joan Jett & Blackhearts (You will find it in the campaign and unlocked from the beginning)
- Ruski Bruski - Professor Plumb (In the store you can buy this song)

Game Improvements:
- The size of the obese has been reduced to improve visibility
- Roll tracking for the obese has been improved
- Siamese tracking has been improved
- Adjusted S rank on hard so it's not impossible now
- Store prices have been adjusted, now everything is cheaper.
- Added position system setup for drums
- Now you can preview all songs in challenge mode
- The desert scenario has been optimized
- The stars required to progress in the campaign have been reduced
- Variations of Boxing Gloves and Blindness have been improved.
- Challenge Scrollbar Fixed
- Fixed various bugs
